archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Verification
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.9.1] The purpose of the Verification process is to provide objective evidence that a system or system element fulfils its specified requirements and characteristics.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 83

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.4.9.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Verifikation" ist es, nachzuweisen, dass das System die spezifizierten Anforderungen erfüllt und die geforderten Eigenschaften besitzt".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.9.1] The purpose of the Verification process is to provide objective evidence that a system or system element fulfils its specified requirements and characteristics.
